text: Colors Bangla previously known as ETV Bangla is 24-hour Bengali language television channel. The channel aired the Filmfare Awards East 2017. It has shows like Subho Drishti and Resham Jhanpi. == Currently broadcast == ===Drama=== * Jay Jaggannath * Sona Roader Gaan * Tumpa Autowali * Indrani * Mou Er Bari * Tumi je amar maa ===Dubbed shows=== * Katha Kahini * Ram Shitar Lab Kush * Sopoth Bhalobasar * Barrister Babu * Adorer Chhoya ==Previously broadcast programmes== *Aponjon *Bisharjan *Byomkesh *Bene Bou *Hushiyar Bangla *E Aamar Gurudakshina *Robi Thakurer Golpo *Rojgere Ginni *Roopkatha *Bhorer Khub Kache *Arakshaniya *Apur Kotha *Gachhkouto *Jhumur *Lukochuri *Probhu Amaar *Shaanjhbela *Satyameva Jayati *Mahakaliâ€“ Anth hi Aarambh hai *Shani *Neelpori *Faagun Legeche Bone Bone *Barir Naam Bhalobasha *Kokhono Megh Kokhono Bristi *Dutta & Bouma *Basanta Bilas Meshbaari *Shonar Horeen *Taranath Tantrik *Tithir Atithi *Dhup Chhaya *Lal Trikon *Krishnokoli Tarei Boli *Utshaber Ratri *Jaya *Resham Jhapi *Manasha *Nachbe Radha *Beta Betir Battle *Baranday Roddur *Gaan Live *Fatafati Filmy Fight *Naach Dhum Macha Le *Dada Na Didi *Sur Doriya *Bengal Music League *Laughaa Laughee *Nachbe Tolly Tak Dhina Dhin *Kaacher Manush *Debiboron *Shishirer Shobdo *Sa Theke Sa *Roshni *Binni Dhaner Khoi *Soloana *Swayangsiddha *Aastha *Durgeshnandani *Biyer School *Jhalak Dikhala Jaa Bangla *Kotha Dilam *Shubho Bibaho *Subho Drishti *Ranga Mathaye Chiruni *Bigg Boss Bangla *Hiyar Maajhe *Dui Prithibi *Dutta Barir Chhoto Bou *Rannaghore Rockstar *Sera Bouthan *Hoyto Tomari Jonno *Sohaagi Sindoor *Tumi Ele Taai *Sadhok Bamakhyapa *Bhalobasha Bhalobasha *Soubhagyaboti *Bhule Jeona Please *Gouridaan *Shesh Theke Shuru *Maa er Super Kid *Prathamar Rannaghar *Maa Durga *Meera *Great Music Gurukul *Bindaas Dance *Ganer Guto *Naagin *Pita *Ki Kore Toke Bolbo *Kajallata *Naagleela *Daashi ==References== Category:Television channels in India Category:2000 establishments in Asia
